events.title: AI Servers and Data Center
events.description: It’s easy to forget that everything we do on the internet and in our AI platforms relies on real-world servers, housed in data centers, where massive amounts of hardware work to get that output back on your computer screen.

events.title: AI’s Environmental Impact: What You Need to Know
events.description: Emerging research shows that AI can harm the environment. Governments and companies can take steps to regulate it.
